channel.title: The server status page
channel.description:
I really don't know were to post this as i cant post this on moparisthebest.com or w-e and this is related to here so ill post it here.
I've been wondering about the rule to 'do not abuse the serverstatus page' as this haven't been obviously enforced. We see alot of Alcazar and that Rune w-e server being posted over and over and i thought we could only add in 1 server? Why hasn't any admin taken their banhammer and remove all these crappy but relatively good spammy servers off for abusing this rule? Really want to know why...

item.title: The server status page
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:

I really don’t know were to post this as i cant post this on moparisthebest.com or w-e and this is related to here so ill post it here.
